channel.title: Docker.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Docker.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Streamlining Local Development with Dev Containers and Testcontainers Cloud
item.description: Learn how to run Testcontainers-based tests or services from within dev containers and how to leverage Testcontainers Cloud securely and efficiently to make interacting with Docker even easier. Link to article: https://www.docker.com/blog/streamlining-local-development-with-dev-containers-and-testcontainers-cloud/
